Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that allows two people to communicate over a distance.
The student can show how the device uses sound or light for communication in the drawing.
The student can use only the designated materials in their drawing, such as string and cups, to illustrate the string telephone.
The student can include in their drawing the feature that allows the device to send or receive information.
The student can demonstrate in their drawing how communicating over long distances helps people communicate more easily.
